entry.content:
Welcome to this weeks edition of FridayFive - BEST of the week gone by in AR/VR/MR/3D/AI & Games - 23

Hi There, Sorry- I haven’t posted in 2 weeks & that tells me even a WFH person like me needs to go out & there is some good news on that front. So lets start,

VR is ideal for those who work in the #construction industry & #Trezi is a platform made right here in #India for the world- Link

If you are looking for ideas & products on #AR & VR then you must follow #ProductHunt - Link.

In every challenge there is an opportunity, join #Reuters in the ‘Global Online’ #XR for Enterprises event- Link

Can a professional sportsman use #VR to keep up with his game in a lock-down? well #Rezzil thinks so- Link

Is this the #future, have you ever seen these many kids exercise, using a VR device - Link

Do you plan to use AR/VR tech this year ??? Check out this link Link & get in touch with me.

Stay Safe , till the next time, Cheers.

#Coldface

entry.content:
Welcome to this weeks edition of FridayFive- BEST of the week gone by in AR/VR/MR/3D/AI & Games-22

Hello World,

In an earlier post I had written how every bit of technology should be used to beat COVID-19 & the XR community is doing its bit.

I feel robbed, while I was stuck with my idea for a social distancing app , #Snap INC has gone ahead & created one - Link

The #XR community is taking on COVID-19, 17K doctors are using VR in this fight - Link

Hyper-casual games continue to find audiences & prove they are here to stay, tell me if these 3 games are fun - Link

Lock-downs means everyone has a home office now, #VR is aiding these #Ford designers to inspect cars too - Link

Looks like the scene has begun to evolve for consumer #AR in India, If you are a Bollywood fan, you might want to try this one out- Link

Do you plan to use AR/VR tech this year ??? Let me show you effective ways to begin with AR/VR . Check out this link - Link for details.

Stay home - Stay safe

#Coldface

entry.title: FridayFive - BEST of the week gone by in AR/VR/MR/3D/AI & Games - 21

link.title: FridayFive - BEST of the week gone by in AR/VR/MR/3D/AI & Games - 21

entry.content:
How many of you feel , a situation like the present leads to innovation and creativity.

Do constraints help people generate new ideas.

Many of us are finding it difficult to make this transition. We are forced to use unknown, untested methods & practices.

We were not wired for something like COVID19 before & now our mindset has to grapple with questions with no easy answers.

I quit heading a animation/game school so I could get into game development. I took a mini sabbatical & my first action on the third day at home was to write answers to questions on Quora.

It’s empowering to help others, to share what you know. Being productive with your expertise is taking away space from negative thoughts.

I gained perspective on many thoughts that had earlier eluded me. I discovered new ways & tools to improve my writing.

Then out of the blue, I was Quora top writer for 2018 & it all made sense.

Later that summer I started giving swimming lessons to kids in my society . It helped me think over my plans as I took to the pool after the kids were done.

For the first time in our working lives we have time on our hands.

Remote work is not easy & it takes time to adjust to these sudden changes in our lives.

So give yourself the time.

#Thoughts
entry.summary: How many of you feel , a situation like the present leads to innovation and creativity.

entry.title: FridayFive - BEST of the week gone by in AR/VR/MR/3D/AI & Games - 20

link.title: FridayFive - BEST of the week gone by in AR/VR/MR/3D/AI & Games - 20

entry.content:
Will COVID-19 Change the Fate of Virtual Reality and Augmented Reality?

The writer is raising valid questions amidst all the hype & euphoria surrounding the growing demand of #XR / #AR / #VR solutions from companies & businesses .

I personally have no doubts on the viability of XR in the long term but I sure don’t want to get carried away by the growing noise in the short term.

We have a serious life threatening situation, but its not a permanent one. It has unified the world like never before & its a matter of time before things will be put under control.

There is no other way to do it, even though the virus seems to have an upper hand for the moment.

Getting back to normal will be the most important achievement for all of us.

So what happens to all the hurried investments made by XR community & businesses they serve, once life goes back to normal .

#Thoughts
entry.summary: Will COVID-19 Change the Fate of Virtual Reality and Augmented Reality?

entry.content:
Welcome to this weeks edition of FridayFive- BEST of the week gone by in AR/VR/MR/3D/AI & Games-19

Hello Friends,

I hope all of you are safe in the comforts of your homes as you read this newsletter.

This #fitness virtual gadget is the first of its kind & a hit with VR #gamers. Find out if its available for your favourite game on #Steam - Link

We can’t visit places, but whats there to stop you from using this #Snapchat augmented reality portal of #fenwaypark created by #RedSox Link

We all need to find ways & means to stay in a positive frame of mind. So here’s a list of #VR apps to give you that extra boost- Link

Buttons on VR #controllers can be unwieldy, but things are about to change. Etee, is a button free VR controller & you can back it here on #Kickstarter- Link

VR hardware costs a bomb, but sometimes you do get a bargain & #Oculus is giving you a deal on the #Rift- Link

I plan to make these posts better & you can look forward to some new additions in the coming weeks.

Do you plan to use AR/VR tech this year ??? Let me know how may I help you with your queries. Check out this link- Link for details & stay-safe.

#Feedback

entry.title: FridayFive - BEST of the week gone by in AR/VR/MR/3D/AI & Games - 18

link.title: FridayFive - BEST of the week gone by in AR/VR/MR/3D/AI & Games - 18

entry.content:
Latest update on the #FurTool that we are developing for the #unityasset store. I have posted earlier iterations twice before. With this version we are nearing the finish line & then we go to testing with 3D artists. This was the drill last time too.

The artist who is helping out with the test, is an experienced 3d hand with good #texturing skills. Up till now its the #programmer :-) who was painting the textures in Gimp. We also hope to test with non-BEAR animals & human models too.

Shoutout to 3d character artists, if you would like to contribute character model for the test, we would be happy to use it & share the results with that artist.

NOTE- The model will still be yours & will not be added to our #showreel. We will share the results & you can decide if it can be displayed or not.

Appreciate it if some of the #3d #characters #artists who struggle with creating 3d-Hair or Fur in their work, could throw in their comments or a word of advise.

</div
entry.summary: Latest update on the #FurTool that we are developing for the #unityasset store. I have posted earlier iterations twice before. With this version we are nearing the finish line & then we go to testing with 3D artists. This was the drill last time too.

entry.content:
Hello Friends,

A pandemic has set out to conquer the world. Its a call to arms for human ingenuity, innovation & good ole grit. Not only are we fighting back, we have begun to turn the tide.

Our beloved #EPL stars are in the safety of their homes, but there’s no stopping them from using #VR to train their kicks- Link.

How do you increase your online #fashion business by a whopping 250 per cent? Show clients #3D models of your products in #AR- Link.

If you choose to venture a bit deeper into AR Try-Ons & you are bound to see your bottom line expand- https://wanna.by/ .

#Designers need to interact with other stakeholders, Now they can collaborate in 3d VR at any scale in #realtime- https://lnkd.in/fQ6bT92 .

Do you agree, considering the latest health situations, AR/VR technologies are a viable option for business communication- Link.

Let me know what you think

As always give me your feedback & reach out to know how your business can use AR/VR. Check this link for more details. Link & get in touch with your queries . Lets connect up on Twitter @coldfacei or here on linkedin. #Staysafe #consulting

entry.title: FridayFive - BEST of the week gone by in AR/VR/MR/3D/AI & Games - 16

link.title: FridayFive - BEST of the week gone by in AR/VR/MR/3D/AI & Games - 16

entry.content:
Welcome to this weeks edition of FridayFive- BEST of the week gone by in AR/VR/MR/3D/AI & Games-19

#ArtSpecial

The world around has changed & I don’t know how life will enfold from now on. Both work & the current events have kept me from posting this newsletter for two weeks. So i am resuming from where I had left.

#bringArtToLive is the moto of this #AR app platform, so show the world how good your AR artwork is- https://artivive.com/

If there’s Art then you have Art curators, but times have changed, because now we also have AR art curation apps & tech platforms to give your work the much needed love- https://eyejackapp.com/.

AR is versatile & this app by Alberto Taiuti allows you to upload your 2D art in layers & view it in stylised AR- https://apple.co/3dm4fB1.

For those who find it difficult to sketch,no worries this AR app will teach you how to draw- https://sketchar.tech/.

Now that you have created a masterpiece, then it deserves a wall & you can use this AR app to view your artwork on your wall - https://lnkd.in/gmnH2QZ.

I hope these links keep you occupied & help you discover the artist in you. Do try to use these wonderful tools & share your #ART for it might mean something to someone & make their day. Thank you for reading & #staysafe.
entry.summary: Welcome to this weeks edition of FridayFive- BEST of the week gone by in AR/VR/MR/3D/AI & Games-19

entry.title: FridayFive - BEST of the week gone by in AR/VR/MR/3D/AI & Games - 15

link.title: FridayFive - BEST of the week gone by in AR/VR/MR/3D/AI & Games - 15

entry.content:
As a virus shows our world how fragile we are,

I see a deluge of content on how the use of various technologies will help people engage with others & maintain a social distance.

Let me clarify at the onset. I wouldn’t mind tons of work coming my way because people want to interact with the world using digital aids.

I definitely mind if people are forced to need some technology for no fault of theirs.

Where’s the win-win here.

Technology should not be seen as cold & unsympathetic, because it is not. No doubts, every bit of technology must be used to beat this situation. But for now I don’t want to shove it in anyone’s face.

Some technologies will help some people, but not everyone.

And its so obvious, the world was not ready with a ‘real’ solution or technology- before we got hit by a pandemic of global proportions.

There are reports, of people losing jobs, because companies cant afford to keep employees at home. You cant manufacture a sock, grow vegetables or repair gas pipelines from your homes.

I am no expert, but this is neither 2008, 9/11 or like some past epidemic. What it is & what will be its aftermath we don’t know.

Can we beat it, we sure can, for this too shall pass.

#staysafe #thoughts
entry.summary: As a virus shows our world how fragile we are,

entry.title: FridayFive - BEST of the week gone by in AR/VR/MR/3D/AI & Games - 14

link.title: FridayFive - BEST of the week gone by in AR/VR/MR/3D/AI & Games - 14

entry.content:
We are running some tests on the latest version of the Fur & Hair tool that we had published to the Unity Asset store in October 2019.

We have added configurable multiple segments for each fur strand, so that they can bend. Each fur strand is made up of more than one particles (vertices) , so now each can be simulated independently.

In the earlier iteration the fur strand was just a triangle, with fixed base and only its tip could be simulated. Now the fur strand (triangle) is subdivided and more than one of its vertices can be simulated so they can bend much more realistically.

#Update-17March

This project has helped us get better in some niche areas of 3d programming in Unity & Unreal. Lets see how it has helped us with other projects.

A- With the 3d cloth fitting ( Kinect based Virtual Mirror) on a dynamic 3d avatar was where the mesh level programming concepts learnt before in Unity helped take it to another level Unreal.

B- On the 2nd version of the fur tool (Video Above) we have moved away from base mesh manipulation to developing shader system that operate at the GPU level.

#Fur #Hair #Unity #Asset #store #simulation #physics #Unreal #ColdFace #3D #Artist #Character #creature #animal #Bear #WIP

</div
entry.summary: We are running some tests on the latest version of the Fur & Hair tool that we had published to the Unity Asset store in October 2019.
